# payconductor-sdk::PostOrdersRequestSession

If externalSessionId or sessionId is provided and an existing session exists, it will be updated with the new data. Otherwise, a new session will be created.

## Properties
Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**expiresInMinutes** | **numeric** | Time in minutes for checkout session expiration | [optional] [default to 30] [Min: 15] 
**checkoutUrl** | **character** | Checkout URL for redirection | [optional] 
**sessionId** | **character** | ID generated by our service to identify the checkout session | [optional] 
**externalSessionId** | **character** | Checkout session ID generated by the client side. The ID must be unique for each cart session | [optional] [Min. length: 16]
